content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Learn how to always show scrollbars with CSS.
How To Force / Always Show Scrollbars
Add
overflow: scroll;
to show both the 
horizontal and vertical scrollbar:
Example
body {
overflow: scroll; /* Show scrollbars */
}

To only show the vertical scrollbar, or only the horizontal scrollbar, use
overflow-y
or
overflow-x
:
Example
body {
overflow-y: scroll; /* Show vertical scrollbar */
overflow-x: scroll; /* Show horizontal scrollbar */
}

Tip:
To learn more about the
overflow
property, go to our
CSS Overflow Tutorial
or
CSS overflow Property Reference
.
